Helping entrepreneurs to systemise their businesses with Keap/ Infusionsoft.","transcript":"Do you want... 	Increased sales and profits? 	Rhythmic acquisition of new customers? 	Automate processes – saving time and costs? 	Systemise your business? If YES then let's have a chat   Who is Julian Mills? Julian Mills has over the past 25 years worked "in-the-trenches" with hundreds of small business owners to rhythmically acquire and retain customers by systemising and automating their marketing and sales processes. His marketing campaigns and initiatives have generated well in excess of £50M in sales for his clients. He is a leading Keap / Infusionsoft consultant and an Entrepreneurs Circle Certified Coach who believes in keeping marketing simple and bull sh*t free and strives to not only add serious value for clients but inject fun and a few laughs along the way.   Julian the Keap/ Infusionsoft Consultant As a Keap / Infusionsoft consultant, I work with entrepreneurs to systemise businesses and grow sales and profits by creating Keap / Infusionsoft marketing strategies and then implementing them. I work both with clients that want to get started and buy Keap / Infusionsoft and with established Keap / Infusionsoft clients who realise that they now need external help from an expert. I have over 12 years of dedicated, 'hands-on' experience working with Keap / Infusionsoft clients. As an established UK Keap / Infusionsoft Consultant and Certified Partner, I am officially recognised by Keap as a CRM & Marketing Automation expert and ranked by client feedback as the #1 Consultant on the Keap Marketplace. Julian the Entrepreneurs Circle Marketing Coach At heart, I am a marketer. A client once said to me - "Julian, you do not sell Infusionsoft, you sell marketing and Infusionsoft is just the tool that enables you to deliver your marketing". Over the past 25 years as a marketer, initially as an employee and since 2005 as a consultant, I have helped hundreds of business owners to grow their sales. As a result, I now have 25+ years of real-life, "in the trenches" marketing experience. I have seen the highs and the lows and an education from the university of real life that you cannot get from academia. What I found with my Keap / Infusionsoft clients was that they were also coming to me for marketing advice and therefore becoming an Entrepreneurs Circle Certified Coach gave me a solid foundation enabling me to further assist my clients. Read my post on becoming an EC marketing coach.   What Nigel Botterill has to say about CRMs and Keap... https://www.youtube.com/watch?vMTlJtbXqhDM Get a free copy of my book - The Entrepreneurs Marketing System The Entrepreneurs Marketing System has been written by myself and Nigel Botterill and has taken the best part of 10 years to hone, refine and test and is the foundation of the Entrepreneurs Circle coaching system. It gives SME business owners a proven step-by-step system to get and retain all the customers they'll ever need.... Rhythmically & consistently - just like clockwork. You'll need a deep understanding of the Entrepreneurs Marketing System if you are going to use it in your business and this is exactly what our new book provides. If you would like a copy you just pay the postage and packing. >> GET YOUR FREE COPY << What is Keap / Infusionsoft Marketing Automation and how could it transform your business? Julian Mills – Keap / Infusionsoft Consultant & Entrepreneurs Circle Coach
Automate processes – saving time and costs?
If YES then let’s have a chat

Julian Mills has over the past 25 years worked “in-the-trenches” with hundreds of small business owners to rhythmically acquire and retain customers by systemising and automating their marketing and sales processes.
His marketing campaigns and initiatives have generated well in excess of £50M in sales for his clients.

He is a leading Keap / Infusionsoft consultant and an Entrepreneurs Circle Certified Coach who believes in keeping marketing simple and bull sh*t free and strives to not only add serious value for clients but inject fun and a few laughs along the way.

As a Keap / Infusionsoft consultant, I work with entrepreneurs to systemise businesses and grow sales and profits by creating Keap / Infusionsoft marketing strategies and then implementing them. I work both with clients that want to get started and buy Keap / Infusionsoft and with established Keap / Infusionsoft clients who realise that they now need external help from an expert. I have over 12 years of dedicated, ‘hands-on’ experience working with Keap / Infusionsoft clients. As an established UK Keap / Infusionsoft Consultant and Certified Partner, I am officially recognised by Keap as a CRM & Marketing Automation expert and ranked by client feedback as the
Julian the Entrepreneurs Circle Marketing Coach
At heart, I am a marketer. A client once said to me –
“Julian, you do not sell Infusionsoft, you sell marketing and Infusionsoft is just the tool that enables you to deliver your marketing”

. Over the past 25 years as a marketer, initially as an employee and since 2005 as a consultant, I have helped hundreds of business owners to grow their sales. As a result, I now have 25+ years of real-life, “in the trenches” marketing experience. I have seen the highs and the lows and an education from the university of real life that you cannot get from academia. What I found with my Keap / Infusionsoft clients was that they were also coming to me for marketing advice and therefore becoming an Entrepreneurs Circle Certified Coach gave me a solid foundation enabling me to further assist my clients.
